author: alkebulan.alliance
title: Empowering Women through Cardano
description: How can we empower Women and Non Binary People to be involved in decision making in Catalyst in the between now and July 2022
importance: Half of the population of the globe are underrepresented in Catalyst, as we develop skills, tools and processes to be used in the future.
success: Put her in a position to manage her education, finances, health, work. Empower her to bring her voice, opinion to develop Project Catalyst.
